string.value: I met #bPorter#k at the Command Center in the Omega Sector and gave him Rombot's 3 memory cards, but oh my... he was unable to decipher one of the three, and destroyed it. I'll need to find another one of Rombot's Memory Card for Porter.
I watched over Porter's deciphering with an uneasy feeling, but thankfully he didn't make any mistake this time around.

Oh no... I was able to decipher 2 out of 3 #t4000124#s that you gave me, but the other one... I sneezed in the middle of it, and the deciphering failed as a result. (Sniff sniff~) What should I do...? Well, there's not much I can do. Please head back to the Eos Tower, defeat #b#o4130103##k, and gain #b#t4000124##k for me. One's all I need.

(Sniff sniff~) Hoh... so you brought 1 #b#t4000124##k. It must not have been easy for you, but you did it anyway. Alright, then, I'll try to hold in the cough and sneeze as much as I can, so please wait one second. (Sniff sniff~) Let's see... this is a much more complicated program than the one you got last time.

(Sniff sniff~) I'm really really sorry about last time. You're still short on 1 #b#t4031118##k. Please go back to the Eos Tower, defeat #b#o4130103##k once more, and then obtain #b#t4000124##k so I can decipher it for you guys, with no error whatsoever. (Sniff sniff~) Any good cold medicine?
